title: uyiruLLa kaDavuLaiyE
sahitya:
uyiruLLa kaDavuLaiyE nalla uzhaippinAl vazhipaDuvOm


anupallavi

  tuyargaLil aghappaTTut-tuDittuk-kaNNIr vaDikkum tollaiyellAm ini illai enrAgiDa


caraNam    manidar sheida shilaigaL vAi tirandu pEshumO marak-kudirai Erin markkaLam tAvumO
kaniyiDam paDam pizhindAl iniya rasam varumO kallukku pughaTTiya shollum payan tarumO
kaNNUkku meyyAgak-kANulagAyam viNNukku samamAga viLangiDa nALumE
